game.name: 伴我同行 Walk alongside me
game.shortDescription: "Walk Alongside Me" is a tactical roguelike deckbuilder. Command a dynamic duo, using seamless rotation and card synergy to build a unique combat system on your quest to rescue your family and save the world. Choose your heroes and begin your journey!
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Walk Alongside Me" is a tactical roguelike deckbuilder. Command a dynamic duo, using seamless rotation and card synergy to build a unique combat system on your quest to rescue your family and save the world. Choose your heroes and begin your journey!
